scripts.db:migrate:local: echo "y" | wrangler d1 migrations apply DB --local
scripts.db:migrate:stg: echo "y" | wrangler d1 migrations apply DB --env staging --remote
scripts.db:migrate:prod: echo "y" | wrangler d1 migrations apply DB --remote
scripts.db:setup: bun run db:generate && bun run db:migrate:local && bun run db:seed:local
scripts.db:reset: bun run db:delete && bun run db:setup
scripts.check: bun run biome && bun run tsc && bun run test
scripts.check:ci: bun run biome:ci && bun run tsc && bun run test
scripts.e2e: vite build --mode client && vite build && bun run e2e:chromium && bun run e2e:firefox && bun run e2e:webkit
scripts.preview: vite build --mode client && vite build && wrangler dev --ip 0.0.0.0
scripts.deploy:stg: vite build --mode client && vite build && wrangler deploy --env staging
scripts.deploy:prod: vite build --mode client && vite build && wrangler deploy
